metadata.title: CVE-2019-20808 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In QEMU 4.1.0, an out-of-bounds read flaw was found in the ATI VGAimplementation. It occurs in the ati_cursor_define() routine while handlingMMIO write operations through the ati_mm_write() callback. A maliciousguest could abuse this flaw to crash the QEMU process, resulting in adenial of service.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
